name: 5 More Minutes (Kyle Vekos, meowriko)
description:
Stay asleep for just 5 more minutes in this cozy match-3 puzzle game!

You're comfy and cozy in bed, having the most wonderful dream...

In your semi-lucid state, you hear the birds beginning to chirp with the dawn...

As reality and fantasy begin to blur, you realize your alarm will ring soon...

If only... there was a way... to earn 5 more minutes...

NOTE: The audio does not work in the browser version, please download and play the desktop version below for working audio!

Controls

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

Move to swap places with a cozy item (moon, pillow, blanket, stuffed bunny) to match 3 or more

Avoid the enemies who want to wake you! (sun, coffee)

Credits

  • Stav Hinenzon - Design and Code
  • Ben Seavello - Art and Audio
  • Kyle Vekos - Design, Code, and Trailer
  • Erika Mariko Olsen - Collaborator, Writing
